ComicInfo.Summary:
The Chain Gang makes explosive surgical strikes on a number of illegal gambling dens owned by 'The Crooked Man,' a twisted criminal mastermind with the entire city in his clutches...and a sick combat arena in his mansion called 'The Pit.'
